item.title: INTUIT INC 10-K
item.description: INTUIT INC, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 02, 2022 had 39301 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 457 instances tax - 336 instances may - 311 instances financial - 306 instances fiscal - 301 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
